definition: a place used to detain persons who are in the lawful custody of the government, to confine lawfully, in or as in a jail
details:
noun
- a place used to detain persons who are in the lawful custody of the government
= example: a place used to detain persons who are in the lawful custody of the government
= synonyms: pokey
verb
- to confine lawfully, in or as in a jail
= example: to confine lawfully, in or as in a jail
= synonyms: remand
